manifest.name: YouTube Tweak - Power-up extension for a cleaner and smarter YouTube experience
manifest.description: Packed with all the features you want: lock video quality, speed buttons, show commenter names, auto-translate comments, hide distractions, and more.

checkbox.enable: Automatically switch to this quality when playback starts

tips.quality: If the selected quality is not available, the highest lower quality will be used.

checkbox.hideCeElement: Translucent ending of the recommended Videos/Authors

checkbox.maxVolume: Disable volume leveling at max volume (true 100%)

checkbox.videoPerRow: Lock number of videos per row

checkbox.enable: Auto skip ads / block thumbnail ads

tips.enable: Experimental feature (unstable). In some cases, you still need to click "Skip" in the player, and it may be detected by YouTube.

alert.resetConfig: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
alert.importError: Failed to import settings, please check the format.
alert.copyError: Failed to copy settings, please try again or use Ctrl+C.

modal.importTips: Paste the settings you want to import here
modal.exportTips: Copy the settings below to import them into another browser or share them with others.
